pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of the In der Burg square, located within the Hofburg Palace complex in Vienna, Austria. The scene is dominated by the grand palace buildings and the central monument to Emperor Francis I. The time-lapse effect shows crowds of people as blurred motion, bustling through the sunny square.
